body_html:
Hi @SsnL, thanks for clarifying. I'm not running multiple such scripts. That is the only script I am running. I cloned the pytorch/examples/dcgan repo, updated the directory paths to align with mine for dataset loading, ran it successfully on CPU and 1 GPU, and see it stall with the above error for n > 1 gpus. I am not running any other scripts that use data_parallel (or any other scripts at all).

And from what I can tell, running the main.py file in the example found here does not make calls to other scripts that may use data_parallel.

body:
Hi @SsnL, thanks for clarifying. I'm not running multiple such scripts. That is the only script I am running. I cloned the pytorch/examples/dcgan repo, updated the directory paths to align with mine for dataset loading, ran it successfully on CPU and 1 GPU, and see it stall with the above error for n > 1 gpus. I am not running any other scripts that use data_parallel (or any other scripts at all). 

And from what I can tell, running the main.py file in the example found [here](https://github.com/pytorch/examples/tree/master/dcgan) does not make calls to other scripts that may use data_parallel.
